summary: This is an FBI Mandatory Abuse Reporting document from March 2023, detailing a call to the FBI National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) alleging historical child sexual abuse involving Jeffrey Epstein and an associate named George Epstein. The caller, whose identity is redacted, describes being abused starting at a young age by wealthy individuals, mentions a 2008 incident with a girl and a dog, and reports ongoing threats, surveillance, and trauma. The document includes database queries for named individuals and instructions for the receiving field office to complete mandatory reporting.

persons.name: Jefferey Epstein
persons.context: Named by the caller as being involved in the alleged child sexual abuse. The caller states 'Jefferey Epstein was in his life' and that parties involving abuse started at a young age.

persons.name: George Epstein
persons.context: Named by the caller as someone who, along with Jeffrey Epstein, 'took him all over.' The caller believes 'George's name was a fake name.'

persons.name: Melissa Gillborn
persons.context: Mentioned by the caller in the context of his traumas. The FBI conducted database queries (Guardian, Sentinel, DIVS) for this name, which revealed no results.

connections.description: The caller alleges they acted together, taking him 'all over' as part of the abuse. The caller associates both with the alleged criminal activity.
The caller mentions Melissa Gillborn's name in the context of discussing his traumas, implying a potential connection to the alleged abuse network, though the nature is unspecified.

events.title: Incident with girl and dog at caller's apartment
events.description: A girl came to the caller's door offering friendship. She later returned with a dog. The caller heard moaning and found the dog humping the girl. When he went to open the door, a group of people were there who dragged him out of his apartment.

events.title: FBI NTOC call reporting allegations
events.description: An individual called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report allegations of historical child sexual abuse involving Jeffrey Epstein and George Epstein, and described ongoing threats and surveillance.

keyFacts: A 2023 report to the FBI alleges historical child sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein and an associate using the name 'George Epstein,' whom the caller believed used a fake name.

The caller described being abused starting at a young age by 'people who had money' and reported ongoing surveillance, threats of death and rape from gangs and the Mafia to prevent him from going to police.
The document references a bizarre 2008 incident where a girl brought a dog to the caller's apartment, which was followed by the caller being dragged out by a group of people.
FBI database queries were conducted for 'Melissa Gillborn,' a name mentioned by the caller in relation to his traumas, but no results were found.

The document is a formal 'Mandatory Abuse Reporting' SAR (Suspicious Activity Report) generated by the FBI's NTOC, triggering a 24-hour mandatory reporting requirement for the receiving field office under FBI policy and state laws.
